Title: Girl Talk
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Stephen Basilone, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam and Marvin help Murray as the store faces competition, while Beverly assists Barry as he courts a girl at school.
